issue.body:
Hello! Here is a fragment of HTML code of the letter. Links to trackers from this fragment are not blocked :( ```
``` I suggest to add this rule: `||eoapxl.com^` Because the part before `eoapxl.com` always different

No. At least I did not find it :)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @ColHathi > It is an issue that only arises after what seems like a semi-random set of time. I often keep my PC on for days at a time, so I frequently run into this issue. > > Turning Adguard's protection off and on doesn't seem to do anything. Restarting the browser helps for a moment at most. Disabling every extension aside from Adguard Browser Assistant doesn't seem to do anything either. Restarting my PC has helped, but the issue comes back as it always does. > > I've been using Adguard for a long time now, and it hasn't always had this issue. I'm pretty sure it's something that's only started to happen with one of the latest stable update releases, maybe the last one (I'm on 7.11.3 currently). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/bo9MhvF.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/XPDGiSX.png)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://reports-img.adguard.com/SAMVrkP.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.11.3 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Block WebRTC DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/windows/filters/15.txt, User+rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
